mapper.sql: select isg.inventory_seeded_grain_guid, isg.inventory_field_guid, isg.crop_commodity_id, cc.commodity_name as crop_commodity_name, isg.crop_variety_id, cv.variety_name as crop_variety_name, isg.commodity_type_code, ctc.description as commodity_type_desc, isg.is_quantity_insurable_ind, isg.is_replaced_ind, isg.is_pedigree_ind, isg.is_spot_loss_insurable_ind, isg.seeding_date, isg.seeded_acres, isg.create_user, isg.create_date, isg.update_user, isg.update_date
mapper.select: from inventory_seeded_grain isg left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = isg.crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = isg.crop_variety_id left join commodity_type_code ctc on ctc.commodity_type_code = isg.commodity_type_code where isg.inventory_seeded_grain_guid = #{inventorySeededGrainGuid}

select t.inventory_seeded_grain_guid, t.inventory_field_guid, t.crop_commodity_id, t.crop_variety_id, t.commodity_type_code, t.is_quantity_insurable_ind, t.is_spot_loss_insurable_ind, t.is_replaced_ind, t.is_pedigree_ind, t.is_spot_loss_insurable_ind, t.seeding_date, t.seeded_acres, t.create_user, t.create_date, t.update_user, t.update_date from inventory_seeded_grain t where t.inventory_seeded_grain_guid = #{inventorySeededGrainGuid}

insert into inventory_seeded_grain( inventory_seeded_grain_guid, inventory_field_guid, crop_commodity_id, crop_variety_id, commodity_type_code, is_quantity_insurable_ind, is_replaced_ind, is_pedigree_ind, is_spot_loss_insurable_ind, seeding_date, seeded_acres, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date) values ( #{inventorySeededGrainGuid}, #{dto.inventoryFieldGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.cropVarietyId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.commodityTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.isQuantityInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.isReplacedInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.isPedigreeInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.isSpotLossInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.seededDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.seededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update inventory_seeded_grain set crop_commodity_id = #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, crop_variety_id = #{dto.cropVarietyId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, commodity_type_code = #{dto.commodityTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, is_quantity_insurable_ind = #{dto.isQuantityInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, is_replaced_ind = #{dto.isReplacedInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, is_pedigree_ind = #{dto.isPedigreeInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, is_spot_loss_insurable_ind = #{dto.isSpotLossInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, seeding_date = #{dto.seededDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, seeded_acres = #{dto.seededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where inventory_seeded_grain_guid = #{dto.inventorySeededGrainGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: delete from inventory_seeded_grain where inventory_field_guid in (select t.inventory_field_guid from inventory_field t where t.field_id = #{fieldId})

delete from inventory_seeded_grain t where t.inventory_field_guid in (select invf.inventory_field_guid from inventory_contract inv join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.contract_id = inv.contract_id and gcy.crop_year = inv.crop_year join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.grower_contract_year_id = gcy.grower_contract_year_id join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = cfd.annual_field_detail_id join inventory_field invf on invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = afd.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where inv.inventory_contract_guid = #{inventoryContractGuid} )
mapper.select: from inventory_seeded_grain isg left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = isg.crop_commodity_id left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = isg.crop_variety_id left join commodity_type_code ctc on ctc.commodity_type_code = isg.commodity_type_code where isg.inventory_field_guid = #{inventoryFieldGuid} order by isg.is_replaced_ind desc, isg.seeding_date

from inventory_seeded_grain isg join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = isg.crop_commodity_id -- Not a left join, because we only want records with a seeded crop. left join crop_variety cv on cv.crop_variety_id = isg.crop_variety_id left join commodity_type_code ctc on ctc.commodity_type_code = isg.commodity_type_code where isg.inventory_field_guid = #{inventoryFieldGuid} and isg.seeded_acres > 0 order by isg.is_replaced_ind desc, isg.seeding_date

WITH inv_acres AS ( SELECT crop_commodity_id, seeded_acres, is_quantity_insurable_ind, is_spot_loss_insurable_ind, is_pedigree_ind FROM inventory_field inv JOIN inventory_seeded_grain isg ON isg.inventory_field_guid = inv.inventory_field_guid WHERE inv.field_id = #{fieldId} AND inv.crop_year = #{cropYear} AND inv.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId} ) SELECT t.crop_commodity_id, is_pedigree_ind, COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(q.seeded_acres) FROM inv_acres q WHERE (q.crop_commodity_id = t.crop_commodity_id or (q.crop_commodity_id is null and t.crop_commodity_id is null)) AND q.is_pedigree_ind = t.is_pedigree_ind AND q.is_quantity_insurable_ind = 'Y' GROUP BY q.crop_commodity_id, q.is_pedigree_ind ), 0) AS total_seeded_acres, COALESCE(( SELECT SUM(q.seeded_acres) FROM inv_acres q WHERE (q.crop_commodity_id = t.crop_commodity_id or (q.crop_commodity_id is null and t.crop_commodity_id is null)) AND q.is_pedigree_ind = t.is_pedigree_ind AND q.is_spot_loss_insurable_ind = 'Y' GROUP BY q.crop_commodity_id, q.is_pedigree_ind ), 0) AS total_spot_loss_acres FROM inv_acres t GROUP BY t.crop_commodity_id, is_pedigree_ind
